frontmatter.title: Contributing to Svelte - Fixing issue #4392
frontmatter.description: I am going to tell you an anecdote on how I investigated and fixed a bug in Svelte. I documented down my train of thoughts as detailed as possible. I hope this gives anyone who is reading, a glimpse on how to work on the Svelte source code.
